name: Tetfun 2000 Reupload On Itch.io
description:
Tetfun 2000 Is Now Even HERE!!

It Works Perfectly On Windows 10.

Play The Classic Version Of Tetfun 2000 From The Official Creators Of It.

Have Fun With Different Pieces Of Blocks (What Does That Even Mean Lol)

Anyways, Download & Play  The Game & HAVE FUN!!

U Can Also Mod This Game By Right Clicking The .exe File & Pressing The "Open File Path" Button.

Also There Are No Sounds Just The Windows 10 Error Sound Lol.
